title: One Piece Episode #641 Anime Review
author: Fandom Post
description: A detailed review of Episode 641 discussing Robin's capture by the Tontatta dwarves and the revelation of their gullible nature. The review notes that Robin was captured by the fairies and tied down Gulliver's Travels style, and explains how these creatures help grow things so big on the island.

title: Sunny Go One Piece Podcast - Dressrosa Arc Discussion
author: Sunny Go Podcast
description: Complete review of the Dressrosa arc with overall thoughts and opinions on what worked and what didn't work, including episodes discussing Leo and the Tontatta Princess Mansherry. Features comprehensive analysis of the arc's major plot points.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Dressrosa arc

title: Piece Out! Isle of Man: The Saturation of Sexism in Dressrosa
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: A bi-weekly editorial feature analyzing gender politics in the Dressrosa arc, mentioning the enslavement of the Tontatta tribe as a key plot point. Provides critical analysis of the arc's themes and characterization.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for mid-Dressrosa arc events

title: One Piece (Dressrosa Arc) Anime Review
author: DoubleSama
description: A comprehensive review discussing the Straw Hat Grand Fleet and how Doflamingo changed the series. Notes that Leo is the leader of the Tontatta Pirates and that Tontatta are basically a pixie race native to Dressrosa.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for entire Dressrosa arc including Grand Fleet formation

title: JCR Comic Arts - One Piece Ep 641 The Unknown World the Tontatta Kingdom Tonight on Toonami
author: JCR Comic Arts
description: Blog post announcing the airing of Episode 641 on Toonami, providing brief context about the episode's content and the Tontatta Kingdom reveal.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Brief episode description without major spoilers
